> Kup sit down around while the little Elita moved closer to her 'uncle'; she still hopes that her mom and dad came back home

As Kup and Elita sit back a small beeping can be heard from the
computer's external warning system. It starts and then stops and then
starts again after a moment. On a screen a small grey dot appeared,
disappeared and the reappeared in a different place, closer to the
Ark's location.

(TAG)

Preston
